name: Only Shadows Left Behind
description: Only Shadow Left Behind is a shoot 'em up with a top view in which you have to clean out the city from the clumps of shadow with a variety of weapons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
